author: mrmitch
title: Coolest little pull back Racer
review: I own 3 mini pull backs and 3 of the bigger pull back motor cars. This blue Off-Roader has the biggest wheels and is fun to send across the room. The small ones retail in the USA for 3.99 or so. If you run across one get it and you will be back to get a racing partner.

author: ratz
title: for collectors of colourful helmets.
review:
i can't remember how the sets 8358, 8359 and 8360 got into my possession, and except you focus on good pull-back motors, these racers are quite irrelevant for someone interested in anything beyond the mind of a 6 year old.
but i should mention that in each of the 3 set's instructions there are building steps for a 4th model, the "night sprinter", to be assembled out of the parts of all 3 sets. it's not bigger than the latter, and doesn't look much better, it just consists mainly of black parts. *yawn* well, so much for that.
